name: Grand Castle on the Hill
description:
DESCRIPTION
Treat yourself to a royal French wedding by inviting your loved ones to share your happiness at this stunning Château. This historical building located in the Tarn-et-Garonne region allows you to go back in time for a day and to unite in an extraordinary environment. You will forever have unique wedding memories.
For the smooth running of your celebration, the Château offers you two reception rooms located in the former stable of the Castle. This space is all original stone, so plenty of character for your big day and can accommodate up to 130 people in the upper banquet hall and about 100 in the lower hall - both rooms are conveniently linked by a beautiful spiral stone staircase.
Outside, you will enjoy the extensive beautiful French gardens, a terrace with spectacular views and a shady courtyard which is perfect for hosting your drinks reception and canapes. Many couples also choose to dine outside under a canopy of fairy lights, using either the gardens at the back or the courtyard at the front. There is also a traditional Pigeonnier (Pigeon House on stilts) that has been recently converted into a beautiful Bridal Suite. The Pigeonnier also offers the perfect spot for your ceremony, with guests seated on the wide steps that are lined with lavender leading down to the lower terrace.
The Château team will be there to answer your questions, to best meet your expectations, to welcome your service providers, your guests and to verify discreetly that this magical day is the best for everyone. We also have at your disposal a fully equipped kitchen for any caterer (we have no set caterer but can provide you with a list of excellent local caterers for all budgets) to use, toilets, cloakroom, tables and chairs.
For a relaxing night while continuing to enjoy the exceptional setting, the Château offers a Bridal Suite in the Pigeonnier (with breakfast provided) and 4 lodgings that can accommodate a total of 20 people comfortably for close friends and family. Otherwise, there are plenty of places to rent in the village for your other guests. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information.
Nearest airport: Toulouse (1h30mins)
Photography: A mixture of the Chateau's own; Katy Webb Photography; Melanie Lucas (Tant des Poses); and Karolina B Photography
